channel.title: Minimum Spanning Trees on ALLAN V. C. QUADROS
channel.description: Recent content in Minimum Spanning Trees on ALLAN V. C. QUADROS

item.title: Announcing the new 'emstreeR' package
item.description: I am proud to announce emstreeR - my first R package that is available on CRAN since the beginning of December 2018. ‘emstreeR’ is a package for fast and easily computing Euclidean Minimum Spanning Trees (EMST). It heavily relies on RcppMLPACK and Rcpp to work as wrapper to the EMST Dual-Tree Boruvka algorithm available in ‘mlpack’ - the C++ Machine Learning library. ‘emstreeR’ allow R users to benefit from the EMST C++ function without having to deal with the R/Rcpp/C++ integration.
